text: (Musa) jwatite: “Chisimu Jwalakwe akuŵecheta yanti chisimu jalakwejo ni ng'ombe jangajijiganya masengo gaguguda litaka, soni jangajitila mbeju, jambonembonepe mwanti jangali liŵala.” Ŵanganyao ŵatite: “Sambano nim'biche nago maloŵe gakuona-onape.” Basi niŵajisikite (mwalikanganichisya), mwanti ŵasigele panandi kuti akatenda
